title: Scaffolding-Based Accounting Learning Program for Understanding [Large-Scale] Double-Entry Bookkeeping

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Accounting Terminology and General Understanding of Financial Statement Structures
context.additional_context: Non-degree program aimed at acquiring practical accounting concepts

learning_goals: Learners can apply the debit/credit rules of double-entry bookkeeping to real-world cases with over 80% accuracy
Learners can explain the process of journal entry creation and linking to financial statements in simplified scenarios
Learners can solve complex accounting situations using a 3-stage scaffolding approach (simplification of terminology → rule application → practical extension)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
